title: What were the last words of Eddie Van Halen? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually, his last words aren’t known. But he did make a post on Instagram on May 8, which is reportedly the last post of Eddie Van Halen. "Happy birthday Al!!" the rocker wrote on Instagram on May 8, 2020, adding, "Love ya!!," and a healthy assortment of hashtags, including, #family, #rockband, and #love He wished a happy birthday to Alex, his bandmate.  Image Source - Google Search R.I.P. Eddie Van Halen.
